TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectParameterCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameter>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameter>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectParameterCollection Implements ICollection(Of ObjectParameter), IEnumerable(Of ObjectParameter)
type ObjectParameterCollection = class interface ICollection<ObjectParameter> interface seq<ObjectParameter> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 将查询参数表示为 中定义的 对象。

span.span: Represents the query parameters as objects that are defined in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将查询参数表示为 中定义的 对象。Represents the query parameters as objects defined in an . 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. 传递给查询生成器方法的参数由序列中 的后续实例聚合。The parameters that are passed to query builder methods are aggregated by successive instances of an in the sequence. 可以使用返回 的 属性访问这些参数。They can be accessed by using the property, which returns the . 添加参数后，只要还没有编译或执行查询，就可以从集合中移除参数，并且可以清除集合。After parameters have been added, they can be removed from the collection and the collection can be cleared, as long as the query has not been compiled or executed. 不能更改参数名称，但可以随时对值进行更改。Parameter names cannot be changed, but values can be changed at any time. 参数在 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the . 集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the collection with the same name. 使用组合方法（如 、、 和 ）时，将对参数进行合并。When using composition methods, such as , , and , the parameters are merged. 参数集不兼容或不完整时会引发异常。An exception is thrown when the sets of parameters are incompatible or incomplete. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例将新参数添加到集合，获取集合中的参数个数。The example adds new parameters to the collection and gets the count of the parameters in the collection. 然后，该示例循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。Then it iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)]

span.span: The parameter to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the specified to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加参数后，只要还没有编译或执行查询，就可以从集合中移除参数，并且可以清除集合。After parameters have been added, they can be removed from the collection and the collection can be cleared, as long as the query has not been compiled or executed. 不能更改参数名称，但可以随时对值进行更改。Parameter names cannot be changed, but values can be changed at any time. 参数在 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the . 集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the collection with the same name. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)]

span.span: Returns if the parameter object was found in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是基于引用的检查。This is a reference-based check. 也就是说，如果，其中包含与同名的参数对象在集合中，此方法将仅返回指定`true`如果它是相同的对象。That is, if an is specified that contains the same name as a parameter object in the collection, this method will only return `true` if it is the same object.

summary.span: 按引用从集合中移除 的实例（如果集合中存在该实例）。

span.span: Removes an instance of an from the collection by reference if it exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果在集合中找到并移除了参数对象，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the parameter object was found and removed from the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是基于引用的比较。This is a reference-based comparison. 即，如果指定的查询参数对象包含的名称与集合中某个参数对象相同，则仅当其是同一对象时，才移除集合中的参数。That is, if a query parameter object is specified that contains the same name as a parameter object in the collection, the parameter in the collection will only be removed if it is the same object. 若要按名称移除对象，请先使用索引器检索参数实例，然后使用此方法移除该实例。To remove an object by name, first use the indexer to retrieve the parameter instance, then remove it by using this method. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例将两个参数添加到集合，然后移除这些参数。The example adds two parameters to the collection and then removes the parameters. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Remove](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectparametercollection_remove)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Remove](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectparametercollection_remove)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合始终为读/写；可以添加、移除和修改参数。This collection is always read/write; parameters can be added, removed, and modified.
